mapper.insert: insert into t_farm (id, owner_id, address, description, picture_path, service_life, area, price, update_time) value (null, #{ownerId}, #{address}, #{description}, #{picturePath}, #{serviceLife}, #{area}, #{price}, null);
mapper.select: select t_farm.id id, t_farm.owner_id ownerId, t_farm.address address, t_farm.description description, t_farm.picture_path picturePath, t_farm.service_life serviceLife, t_farm.area area, t_farm.price price, t_farm.update_time updateTime from t_farm where t_farm.owner_id = #{ownerId};

select t_farm.id id, t_farm.owner_id ownerId, t_farm.address address, t_farm.description description, t_farm.picture_path picturePath, t_farm.service_life serviceLife, t_farm.area area, t_farm.price price, t_farm.update_time updateTime from t_farm;

select v_farm_available.id id, v_farm_available.owner_id ownerId, v_farm_available.address address, v_farm_available.description description, v_farm_available.picture_path picturePath, v_farm_available.service_life serviceLife, v_farm_available.area area, v_farm_available.price price, v_farm_available.update_time updateTime from v_farm_available limit #{start}, #{len};
